title: How Are These Laptops ALREADY On Sale?
description: I investigate the laptop market that has a bunch of sales suspiciously early.   Thanks to Microcentre for sending the laptop over. The Laptop in this video is the the Lenovo Legion Pro 5 16 from Microcenter:   Get some AWESOME Dawid T-shirts, Mouse pads and more here:   Play some Minecraft on the Dawid Does Minecraft server courtesy of our friends at Linode!
